H0.text: Thunderstorm is the event after which primary succession most likely occurs.

H1.text: Crop harvest is the event after which primary succession most likely occurs.

H2.text: Volcanic eruption is the event after which primary succession most likely occurs.

H3.text: Urban development is the event after which primary succession will most likely occur.

A4.text: Primary succession takes place after a volcano has erupted.

A5.text: Another example is taking place on Signy Island in the South Orkney Islands of Antarctica, due to glacier retreat.
